data.title: Football Club History Database
data.text:
NOTTINGHAM FOREST

1878-79 F.A. Cup semi-finalists 1879-80 F.A. Cup semi-finalists 1884-85 F.A. Cup semi-finalists 1889-90 Founder member of Football Alliance 1890-91 Two points deducted for playing an unregistered player 1891-92 Football Alliance Champions F.A. Cup semi-finalists 1892-93 Elected into First Division of Football League 1897-98 F.A. Cup Winners 1899-00 F.A. Cup semi-finalists 1901-02 F.A. Cup semi-finalists 1906 Relegated to Division Two (on goal average) 1906-07 Football League Division Two Champions Promoted to Division One 1911 Relegated to Division Two 1921-22 Football League Division Two Champions Promoted to Division One 1924 Escaped relegation on goal average 1925 Relegated to Division Two 1938 Escaped relegation to Division Three on goal average 1939-40 Football League programme abandoned due to outbreak of war 1949 Relegated to Division Three South 1950-51 Football League Division Three South Champions Promoted to Division Two 1956-57 Football League Division Two runner-up Promoted to Division One 1958-59 F.A. Cup Winners (2nd time) 1966-67 Football League runner-up (on goal average) F.A. Cup semi-finalists 1972 Relegated to Division Two 1976-77 Promoted to Division One Anglo Scottish Cup Winners 1977-78 Football League Champions Football League Cup Winners 1978-79 Football League runner-up European Cup Winners Football League Cup Winners (2nd time) 1979-80 European Cup Winners (2nd time) European Super Cup runner-up Football League Cup runner-up 1983-84 UEFA Cup Semi-Finalists 1987-88 F.A. Cup semi-finalists 1988-89 Football League Cup Winners (3rd time) F.A. Cup semi-finalists 1989-90 Football League Cup Winners (4th time) 1990-91 F.A. Cup runner-up 1991-92 Football League Cup runner-up 1992-93 Founder members of F.A. Premier League Relegated to Football League Division One 1993-94 Football League runner-up Promoted to F.A. Premier League 1995-96 UEFA Cup Quarter Finalists 1997 Relegated to Football League Division One 1997-98 Football League Champions (3rd time) Promoted to F.A. Premier League 1999 Relegated to Football League Division One 2002-03 Not promoted after play-offs (SF Nottingham Forest 1 Sheffield United 1, Sheffield United 4 Nottingham Forest 3 - Agg 4-5) 2004-05 Division One renamed "Football League Championship" 2005 Relegated to League One 2006-07 Not promoted after play-offs (SF Yeovil Town 0 Nottingham Forest 2, Nottingham Forest 2 Yeovil Town 5 - Agg 4-5) 2007-08 Football League One runner-up Promoted to Football League Championship 2009-10 Not promoted after play-offs (SF Blackpool 2 Nottingham Forest 1, Nottingham Forest 3 Blackpool 4 - Agg 4-6) 2016-17 Football League renamed English Football League 2021-22 Promoted to Premier League after play-offs (SF Sheffield United 1 Nottingham Forest 2, Nottingham Forest 1 Sheffield United 2 - Agg 3-3,
